# Scss笔记

## 变量 $打头   插值语法 #{}
```
插值语法

$version: "1.2.3";
/* This CSS is generated by My Snazzy Framework version #{$version}. */

--->

/* This CSS is generated by My Snazzy Framework version 1.2.3. */


```
## 全局变量 和 局部变量 转换
```
#main {
  $width: 5em !global;      //转为全局变量
  width: $width;
}

#sidebar {
  width: $width;
}
```
## 嵌套语法 及 父选择器
```
#main p {
  color: #00ff00;
  width: 97%;

  .redbox {
    background-color: #ff0000;
    color: #000000;
    &:hover { text-decoration: underline; color: white;}
  }
}
```
* & 必须做为第一个字符
```
#main {
  color: black;
  &-sidebar { border: 1px solid; }
}

-->

#main {
  color: black; }
  #main-sidebar {
    border: 1px solid; }

```
## 属性嵌套
```
.funky {
  font: {
    family: fantasy;
    size: 30em;
    weight: bold;
  }
}

--->

.funky {
  font-family: fantasy;
  font-size: 30em;
  font-weight: bold; }


  font :  命名空间

  也可以有自己的属性

  .funky {
  font: 20px/24px {
    family: fantasy;
    weight: bold;
  }
}

-->

.funky {
  font: 20px/24px;
    font-family: fantasy;
    font-weight: bold; }

```
## @import  导入.sass .scss 文件
## @import嵌套语法
```
example.scss 文件

.example {
  color: red;
}


#main {
  @import "example";
}

-->

#main .example {
  color: red;
}

```
## @extend 样式延伸  继承
```
.error {
  border: 1px #f00; 
  background-color: #fdd;
}
.error.intrusion {
  background-image: url("/image/hacked.png");
}
.seriousError {
  @extend .error;
  border-width: 3px;
}

-->


.error, .seriousError {
  border: 1px #f00;
  background-color: #fdd; }

.error.intrusion, .seriousError.intrusion {
  background-image: url("/image/hacked.png"); }

.seriousError {
  border-width: 3px; }
```
